articles.title: Joji Smithereens Tour 2022: Tickets, price, where to buy, dates and more - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Japanese singer, songwriter and rapper Joji has announced that his Smithereens Tour is slated to take place across North America.
articles.content: Japanese singer, songwriter and rapper Joji has announced that his Smithereens Tour is slated to take place across North America. The tour kicks off at Palo Altos Frost Amphitheater on September 1 an… [+2663 chars]

articles.title: Mastodon Killed in Bloody Battle 13200 Years Ago – Reveals Extinct Animal's Annual Migration - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Mastodons are relatives of elephants belonging to the genus Mammut that inhabited North and Central America before they went extinct about 10,000 to 11,000 years ago. Typical adults stood between 8 and 10 feet (2.5-3 m) tall at the shoulder and weighed around…
